thread.title: Arsenal news: Mesut Ozil must get dropped, says ex-Man Utd star Phil Neville | Metro News
thread.title_full: Arsenal news: Mesut Ozil must get dropped, says ex-Man Utd star Phil Neville | Metro News

author: Tom Olver For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Arsenal news: Mesut Ozil must get dropped, says ex-Man Utd star Phil Neville | Metro News
text:
Tom Olver for Metro.co.uk Saturday 11 Feb 2017 11:59 am Ex-Man United ace Phil Neville has hit out at Mesut Ozil (Picture: Getty) 
Arsenal are incapable of winning the Premier League if Mesut Ozil remains in their starting XI, believes ex- Manchester United star Phil Neville . 
Ozil has already had his best season in front of goal for the Gunners, scoring nine times in 27 appearances, but has been criticised for failing to make an impact in the side’s most important matches. Mesut Ozil suffering CRISIS of confidence, admits Arsenal boss Wenger 
Reports suggest a section of Arsenal’s squad have grown frustrated with Arsene Wenger’s persistent selection of the midfielder and it appears Neville sympathises with them. 
‘The first person I’d take out of the team would be Mesut Ozil,’ the former Red Devil said on Football Today. 
‘You cannot win a league title with him in the team, playing like he has done in the big games since he’s come to the Premier League. You just can’t.’ Phil Neville has called for Mesut Ozil to be dropped (Picture: Getty) 
Wenger came out in support of Ozil ahead of Arsenal’s clash with Hull at the Emirates. 
‘The team wins and the team loses. When you win sometimes some players are singled out as they are treated like exceptional players, but when you don’t do well sometimes just focus a little bit more on the team aspect and not try to blame each other,’ he said.
